text: Va [ej pajomʙar, ʙa jod ovar] hangomero, ki Muso ʙa qavmas guft: «Ej qavmi man, caro maro ozor [va azijat] merasoned, dar hole ki medoned, ʙe gumon, man firistodai Alloh taolo ʙa sui sumo hastam?». Pas, cun onon [az haq] munharif sudand, Alloh taolo dilhojasonro munharif soxt; va Alloh taolo qavmi nofarmonro hidojat namekunad
